aka: In the Morning at Seven the World Is Still in Order

cast.name: 阿奇博尔德·埃塞尔 Archibald Eser

director.name: 库尔特·霍夫曼 Kurt Hoffmann

this_title: Morgens um Sieben ist die Welt noch in Ordnung
trans_title: 早上七点，世界依然如常
In the Morning at Seven the World Is Still in Order
introduction: The day to day life of a country family, the Pentecosts. Father is an author, mother is sensitive, grandpa is crotchety, Auntie is deaf, Becky hungers for love, Rose likes to suffer. The king-pin of the whole family is lively, 6 year old Gaylord.Movie version of the novel "Morning´s at seven" by Eric Malpass.
chinese_title: 早上七点，世界依然如常
foreign_title: Morgens um Sieben ist die Welt noch in Ordnung
